title: Tupelo National Battlefield: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions         Map showing Tupelo National Battlefield Site. NPS  Tupelo National Battlefield (NB) is a one-acre monument located on Main Street, Tupelo, Mississippi.  Main Street in Tupelo is also known as Highway 6 and Highway 278.  Tupelo NB sits on the south side of Main Street on the west side of Tupelo.  Exit off the Natchez Trace Parkway onto Highway 6 (near Milepost 260), head east, into Tupelo.  Travel one mile east and find Tupelo NB on the right side of Main Street.  There is limited parking available adjacent to the monument.
